text: The Basketball Diaries is a 1995 American independent biographical crime drama movie directed by Scott Kalvert. It stars Leonardo DiCaprio, Mark Wahlberg and Lorraine Bracco and is set in New York City. This drama is based around an autobiographical novel by the same name, written by Jim Carroll. The Basketball Diaries is about addiction to drugs. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1990s biographical movies Category:1995 crime drama movies Category:1990s teen drama movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:American sports drama movies Category:American teen drama movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies about drugs Category:Movies about heroin addiction Category:Movies about prostitution Category:Movies about writers Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in New York City Category:American independent movies
title: The Basketball Diaries
